Posts.EditableText:
Hey, I was wondering if anyone online was having troubles with playing their games? Mine aren't working!

Also, is KV still around?
Posts.HTML:
Hey, I was wondering if anyone online was having troubles with playing their games? Mine aren't working!

Also, is KV still around?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello!

I pretty much stay offline nowadays, but XanMag found me and showed me this post.

---
There is an issue concerning a missing file (which was added for DevMode, but still messes all the online games up (apparently)).

I exchanged correspondence with Pixie a few days ago, though, and I *believe* the issue has been resolved in the source code on GitHub.  (I may be wrong.)

Until the next update to the web player, though, it looks like this is error is all you can get (sorry!):

---

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30656341/45563932-782ef480-b814-11e8-86cd-ac21790d6d09.png)
Posts.HTML:

Until the next update to the web player, though, it looks like this is error is all you can get (sorry!):
